job_details.experience_required: Minimum of 7 years conducting business process review and requirements elicitation and documentation.

jd: From: Cloud Ingest, Cloud Ingest tahajuddin@cloudingest.com Reply to: tahajuddin@cloudingest.com Job Title: Business AnalystLocation: Lansing, MIRemote Work: PartialPrimary Skills: DevOps, Business Analysis, AzureSpecific Position Experience Required:Minimum of 7 years conducting business process review and requirements elicitation and documentation.Minimum of 5 years developing and/or managing user stories on Agile development project(s).Minimum of 2 years working directly with senior management in facilitating discussions to determine strategy, develop road maps and/or gain consensus to resolve opposing positions.Minimum of 2 years supporting the development of or compliance to statement of work and/or other work agreements/contracts.Minimum of 2 years working on projects developing/implementing IT solutions for public use.Minimum of 1 year working on IT infrastructure projects.Minimum of 1 year working with programs governed by state and/or federal regulations.
